member.name: T:Lab05.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Lab05.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Lab05.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:Lab05.frmLab05
member.summary: Title: Lab 05: Text Editor Created By: Kingsly Bude Created On: 2019-07-25 Last Modified: 2019-07-26 - Kingsly Bude About: Demonstration of basic string readers as well as utilization of prebuilt .NET forms.

member.name: M:Lab05.frmLab05.ExitToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Sub Name: ExitToolStripMenuItem_Click Event: OpenToolStripMenuItem.Click About: Clicking "Exit" provides the user with a way to end the application

member.name: M:Lab05.frmLab05.OpenToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Sub name: OpenToolStripMenuItem_Click Event: OpenToolStripMenuItem.Click About: Clicking "Open" on the menu strip opens a OpenFileDialog. The user can select a text file to open to the text editor to make adjustments.

member.name: M:Lab05.frmLab05.SaveAsToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Sub name: SaveAsToolStripMenuItem_Click Event: SaveAsToolStripMenuItem.Click About: Clicking "Save As" on the menu strip opens a SaveFileDialog. Users can save the contents of the text editor to a new or existing file.

member.name: M:Lab05.frmLab05.SaveToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Sub Name: SaveToolStripMenuItem_Click Event: SaveToolStripMenuItem.Click About: Using "Save" in the menu strip will attempt to save to an existing file the editor is already working on automatically. If there is no file path, the SaveFileDialog will be used and the user can choose to create a new or replace an exsisting file.

member.name: M:Lab05.frmLab05.SaveFileDialog_FileOk(System.Object,System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs)
member.summary: Sub Name: SaveFileDialog_FileOk Event: SaveFileDialog.FileOk About: Sends a message when the user saves a file using the SaveFileDialog

member.name: M:Lab05.frmLab05.AboutToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Sub name: AboutToolStripMenuItem_Click Event: AboutToolStripMenuItem.Click About: Displays information after clink on "About" under "Help" in the menu strip

member.name: M:Lab05.frmLab05.NewToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Sub name: NewToolStripMenuItem_Click Event: NewToolStripMenuItem.Click About: Displays information after clink on "About" under "Help" in the menu strip

member.name: M:Lab05.frmLab05.CopyToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Sub name: CopyToolStripMenuItem_Click Event: CopyToolStripMenuItem.Click About: Copies the selected text in the textbox to the clipboard

member.name: M:Lab05.frmLab05.PasteToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Sub name: PasteToolStripMenuItem_Click Event: PasteToolStripMenuItem.Click About: Pastes the contents of the clipboard to the text editor

member.name: M:Lab05.frmLab05.CutToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Sub name: CutToolStripMenuItem_Click Event: CutToolStripMenuItem.Click About: Copies the selected text in the textbox to the clipboard, and deletes the selected text afterwards
